channel.title: Engineering Optics on FANG META!

item.title: [Theory] Spherical Waves under Paraxial and Far-Field Conditions
item.description: 仰观宇宙之大 俯察品类之盛 所以游目骋怀 足以极视听之娱 信可乐也1 Figure 1 Figure 1 sketches the basic hypothesis of the author’s theory. In the hypothesis, Q is the source point that emits spherical waves2constantly in the universe while P is the field point in considerable distance that receive electromagnetic waves
